name: GloriousGalaxyGodfathers
description:
The AwesomeAlliterationAlliance is making you an offer you can't defuse!

                     
You are a young aspiring Don trying to get a foothold in the intergalatic crime business.

Invest money and manpower in lucrative businesses to gain even more money and manpower.

Become the most notorious mob boss in the whole galaxy, but never ask a man about his business!

                               

Made for #beansjam 2017

Code: Janosch
Visuals: RageAl, LeDuz, Pöppmaster
Sound: NSP, BongoMongoMarcel, Janosch
Playtesting & Text: Juliane van Schnitzelgruben
Concept: Janosch, Juliane van Schnitzelgruben, Pöppmaster
